module.name: ReadGDML
module.text: This module reads a GDML mass model file and builds a geometry.

module.name: WriteGDML
module.text: This module writes geometry built in Geant4 to a GDML format.

module.name: PointSourcePrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated as point source emissions.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Position of the source.

param.name: direction
param.description: Center direction of the primaries.

param.name: theta_min
param.description: Minimum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: theta_max
param.description: Maximum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: luminosity
param.description: Energy luminosity of the point source. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

module.name: PlaneWavePrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated as a plane wave inside a circle.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Center of the circle where primary particles are generated.

param.name: direction
param.description: Propagation direction of the plane wave.

param.name: radius
param.description: Radius of the circle where parimary particles are generated.

param.name: flux
param.description: Energy flux of the plane wave. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

param.name: polarization_vector
param.description: Polarization vector

param.name: degree_of_polarization
param.description: Degree of polarization

module.name: PlaneWaveRectanglePrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated as a plane wave inside a rectangle.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Center of the circle where primary particles are generated.

param.name: direction
param.description: Propagation direction of the plane wave.

param.name: flux
param.description: Energy flux of the plane wave. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

param.name: polarization_vector
param.description: Polarization vector

param.name: degree_of_polarization
param.description: Degree of polarization

param.name: size_x
param.description: Size x of the rectangle where parimary particles are generated.

param.name: size_y
param.description: Size y of the rectangle where parimary particles are generated.

param.name: roll_angle
param.description: Roll angle of the rectangle where parimary particles are generated.

module.name: GaussianBeamPrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated similarly to a plane wave, but has a Gaussian profile instead of a uniform circle.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Center of the circle where primary particles are generated.

param.name: direction
param.description: Propagation direction of the plane wave.

param.name: flux
param.description: Energy flux of the plane wave. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

param.name: polarization_vector
param.description: Polarization vector

param.name: degree_of_polarization
param.description: Degree of polarization

param.name: radial_sigma
param.description: Radial sigma of the beam size.

module.name: IsotropicPrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated to be homogeneous and isotropic in a sphere.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: center_position
param.description: Position of the sphere.

param.name: radius
param.description: Radius of a disk where primaries are generated.

param.name: distance
param.description: Distance between the sphere center and a disk where primaries are generated. If this value is negative, then this parameter is set to be the same as the disk radius [Radius].

param.name: center_direction
param.description: Center direction of the primaries.

param.name: theta_min
param.description: Minimum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: theta_max
param.description: Maximum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: intensity
param.description: Energy intensity of the primaries. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

module.name: PrimaryGenUniformSourceInVolume
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. Primaries are generated to be homogeneous inside a specified volume.

param.name: particle
param.description: Particle name (gamma, e-, e+, proton, neutron, geantino...)

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Position of the source.

param.name: direction
param.description: Center direction of the primaries.

param.name: theta_min
param.description: Minimum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: theta_max
param.description: Maximum angle between the primary direction and the center direction.

param.name: luminosity
param.description: Energy luminosity of the point source. This parameter is used only for calculating real time correspoing to a simulation.

param.name: target_mode
param.description: If on, the primary direction is distrubuted around the vector toward the target position.

param.name: volume_hierarchy
param.description: Volume hierarchy that identifies the primary generating volume.

module.name: NucleusPrimaryGen
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. This module puts a nucleus (radioactive isotope) as a point source.

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Position of the source.

param.name: atomic_number
param.description: Atomic number of the radioactive isotope.

param.name: mass_number
param.description: Mass number of the radioactive isotope.

param.name: energy
param.description: Excitation energy of the radioactive isotope. A value of 0 means the ground state of the nucleus.

param.name: floating_level
param.description: Index specifying a floating level. A value of 0 means a determined level.

module.name: NucleusPrimaryGenInVolume
module.text: Primary generator of MC simulations. This module puts a nucleus (radioactive isotope) whose position is sampled uniformly inside a specified volume.

param.name: energy_min
param.description: Minimum value of the energy distribution

param.name: energy_max
param.description: Maximum value of the energy distribution

param.name: photon_index
param.description: Power law index of the photon spectrum

param.name: energy_mean
param.description: Mean energy of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: energy_sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution

param.name: radiation_temperature
param.description: Radiation temperature in units of keV

param.name: energy_array
param.description: Energy array of spectral histogram

param.name: photons_array
param.description: Photons array of spectral histogram

param.name: position
param.description: Position of the source.

param.name: atomic_number
param.description: Atomic number of the radioactive isotope.

param.name: mass_number
param.description: Mass number of the radioactive isotope.

param.name: energy
param.description: Excitation energy of the radioactive isotope. A value of 0 means the ground state of the nucleus.

param.name: floating_level
param.description: Index specifying a floating level. A value of 0 means a determined level.

param.name: volume_hierarchy
param.description: Volume hierarchy that identifies the primary generating volume.

module.name: StandardUserActionAssembly
module.text: A standard user actions to be set.

module.name: VisualizeG4Geom
module.text: This module applies visualization for Geant4 simulation.

module.name: ConstructDetector
module.text: Construct a detector system, loading a detector configuration file.

param.name: detector_configuration
param.description: XML data file describing a detector configuration.

param.name: detector_parameters
param.description: XML data file of information on detectors.

param.name: detector_configuration
param.description: XML data file describing a detector configuration.

param.name: detector_parameters
param.description: XML data file of information on detectors.

param.name: filename
param.description: XML data file describing a channel map.

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: single, 2: double)

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: pad, 2: DSD, 3: scintillator)

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: pad, 2: DSD, 3: scintillator)

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: pad, 2: DSD, 3: scintillator)

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: pad, 2: DSD, 3: scintillator)

param.name: detector_type
param.description: Detector type (1: pad, 2: DSD, 3: scintillator)

module.name: ReadDataFile
module.text: An abstract module for reading experimental data file.

module.name: CorrectPHA
module.text: Subtract a pedestal level and a common mode noise from a PHA value for every channel.

param.name: pha_randomization
param.description: Randomize PHA values if true

param.name: pedestal_level
param.description: ROOT file of pedestal levels. '0' for disabling the pedestal level correction.

param.name: CMN_estimation
param.description: Calculation method of common mode noise values. 0: no correction, 1: use given value in data, 2: calculate by median, 3: calculate by mean.

param.name: gain_function
param.description: ROOT file of calibrated energy gain file. '0' for disabling the gain correction.

param.name: pha_randomization
param.description: Randomize PHA values if true

param.name: pedestal_level
param.description: ROOT file of pedestal levels. '0' for disabling the pedestal level correction.

param.name: CMN_estimation
param.description: Calculation method of common mode noise values. 0: no correction, 1: use given value in data, 2: calculate by median, 3: calculate by mean.

param.name: gain_function
param.description: ROOT file of calibrated energy gain file. '0' for disabling the gain correction.
